definition: first round (of match, or election)
(prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: This is their first institutional round.
sentences.chinese: 这是他们的第一轮筹资。

sentences.english: I played Kei Nishikori in the first round on Center Court.
sentences.chinese: 和基锦织第一轮就是在中心球场打的。

sentences.english: And once we got into the playoffs, it was getting past the first round.
sentences.chinese: 一旦我们进入季后赛，目标就变成了要过第一轮。

sentences.english: After the first round, my team was skunked by the competition.
sentences.chinese: 第一轮后，我的小组一败涂地。

sentences.english: Bad luck with Chinese National Football Team, they lost their first round.
sentences.chinese: 国足这次运气不好，第一轮就输掉了比赛。

sentences.english: The first round of comprehensive services negotiations will be launched in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 第一轮全面服务贸易谈判将于二零零零年展开。

sentences.english: Most of the amateur teams were eliminated from the competition in the first round.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的业余队在第一轮比赛中就被淘汰了。

sentences.english: French bombers had made the first air strike of the no-fly resolution.
sentences.chinese: 法国轰炸机完成了禁飞决议后的第一轮空袭。

sentences.english: And last year I came here with five first-round losses in a row.
sentences.chinese: 去年，我在这，第一轮连输5场。

sentences.english: Milan will meet Manchester United for the first knock-out round of the Champions League.
sentences.chinese: 米兰将会在冠军联赛第一轮淘汰赛遭遇曼彻斯特联队。

sentences.english: Many Ontario universities announce first round admission decisions later in the month.
sentences.chinese: 大部分安省大学将于四月底公布第一轮录取名单。

sentences.english: Shortlisting will be carried out solely on the basis of information provided on the application form.
sentences.chinese: 第一轮筛选将完全根据本申请表中的信息进行。

sentences.english: For the first race, the King's horse won very easily.
sentences.chinese: 第一轮，齐王的马赢得轻而易举。

sentences.english: We have finished the first complete analysis of the LIGO S3 data set.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经完成了S3数据集的第一轮全面分析。

sentences.english: The first round of games will tell the truth.
sentences.chinese: 第一轮小组赛过后就会知道彼此的斤两。

sentences.english: Liu pulled out injured just before the first heats of the event on Monday. "I'm ecstatic that I am Olympic champion.
sentences.chinese: 刘翔在本周一第一轮预赛前就因伤退出了比赛。

definition: second round (of match, or election)
first round (of a competition etc)
(sports) top eight/quarterfinals
second round (of a match or election)
semifinals
first round or stage (of a match, election, talks, planned policy etc)
to advance in rank/promotion/advancement
round-robin tournament
preliminary contest/initial heats of a competition
quarterfinals
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
group
(sports) semifinal or quarterfinal/to compete in a semifinal (or a quarterfinal)
in turn/by turns/lap/turn/round/classifier for laps, turns, rounds
qualifying round (in sports)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
